issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

components.name: Appcelerator CLI
components.description: Please enter tickets related to Tooling and the CLI here

components.name: Studio
components.description: Please enter tickets related to Titanium Studio here.

fields.description:
When trying to launch our project in liveview using Appcelerator Studio an error is created.  The error is the following:

[ERROR] :  SyntaxError: Parse error
[ERROR] :  File: app
[ERROR] :  Line: 1
[ERROR] :  SourceId: 305546368
[ERROR] :  Backtrace:
[ERROR] :   #0 () at file:///Users/bpowers/Library/Application%20Support/iPhone%20Simulator/7.0/Applications/03213D5D-0BCB-47A6-B988-68DD855A871E/Citadel%20Mobile.app/app.js:502
[ERROR] :  #1 () at file:///Users/bpowers/Library/Application%20Support/iPhone%20Simulator/7.0/Applications/03213D5D-0BCB-47A6-B988-68DD855A871E/Citadel%20Mobile.app/app.js:469
[ERROR] :  #2 () at file:///Users/bpowers/Library/Application%20Support/iPhone%20Simulator/7.0/Applications/03213D5D-0BCB-47A6-B988-68DD855A871E/Citadel%20Mobile.app/app.js:403
[ERROR] :  #3 () at file:///Users/bpowers/Library/Application%20Support/iPhone%20Simulator/7.0/Applications/03213D5D-0BCB-47A6-B988-68DD855A871E/Citadel%20Mobile.app/app.js:677

comments.body:
Please provide the environment information (Titanium SDK version + CLI version + Appcelerator Studio version). It would also be good to know if LiveView is not working for any application or a specific application. Please try restarting Studio and see if that clears up the connection.

I tried LiveView with a simple classic sample application on iOS and it is working as expected. My environment: Titanium SDK 3.2.1 + CLI 3.2.1 + Studio 3.2.1 and OSX 10.8.5.

Had a call with customer and he gave these versions:

Titanium: 3.2.1
CLI version: 3.2.1
Appcelerator Studio 3.2.1

OS - 10.8.5

He created a dummy application and live view worked with a normal build but doesn't work with his own build. Bert is on the call with me troubleshooting.
The user is an existing titan.
